Enjoy March of the Eagles PC Game :)
Just right click on flt-mote.001 and choose Open with and choose Winrar and then you can unpack to get the iso :)
Have fun!

it doesn't work on win 7

Ok, why is this game lagging so much that is unplayable? My PC configuration meets requirements, i play all other paradox games, and even much more graphicaly complex games like Shogun 2 total war with smooth flow. This game lags hard, even on 1024 x 768 resolution with trees turned off :(. I have win 7, 4 GB RAM, 3ghz dual core AMD CPU, and Nvidia card with 512 MB, and as i sad, all other games work perfect. Is there maybe a crack hiden that i didnt saw?
Forget that, it was my mistake. I pluged monitor in wrong plug in. Instead of that of graphic card, it was in motherboard. Im an idiot, i know :)
